slideInfo.title: What Can Primary Sources Help You Do?

pButton.Name: Draw Conclusions
pButton.popInfo: Primary Sources provide direct information that can be used to draw conclusions or make inferences about historical questions.

pButton.Name: Historical Evidence
pButton.popInfo: Primary Sources provide evidence to support conclusions drawn by students of history.

pButton.Name: Points of View
pButton.popInfo: Primary sources allow us to examine different points of view about events of the past.
